pages.text: $(#033dfc)Treasure Rooms$() are small rooms that can be found inside the walls of Vault Rooms, which can be unlocked with Vault Keys that match the door type.$(br2)Treasure Rooms contain two Treasure Chests that have extremly valuable loot, containing otherwise unobtainable Items and modded Items.

pages.title: Opening Rooms
pages.text: To open Treasure Rooms, you require a Treasure Key that matches its door type.$(br2)Upon right clicking with the key, the door will open and the key will be consumed. Attempting to otherwise get into a Treasure Room will instantly unalive the player.
